column6:
Beautiful, spacious, newly furnished 1b1b with additional 1 sofa bed and 1 queen-sized air mattress. Accommodates 2-6 people comfortably - great for business or family/friends. Equipped with full kitchen, fast Wifi, washer & dryer. 
•	10 min to Energy Corridor
•	15 min to Memorial
•	15 min to Citycenter
•	25 min to the Galleria
•	30 min to NRG Stadium
•	30 min to Rice University
•	35 min to downtown Houston
•	35 min to Texas Medical Center
•	35 min to Convention Center
•	1 hr to Space Center
